Title: AG&P LNG partners BK LNG to supply LNG to China; first cargo to Huaying terminal by end-Aug
Description: LNG infrastructure developer AG&P LNG has teamed up with BK LNG Solutions to supply LNG to China, starting with the delivery of their first spot cargo to the yet-to-be-launched 6 mtpa Huaying LNG terminal in Chinaâ€™s southern city of Chaozhou scheduled for the end of August.
Author: CK
